messages.subject: Vaccine info on the web
messages.msgSnippet: Hi again, I just finished reading that Vaccine Guide book, and there s a list of web sites in the back. I haven t checked any of them out yet, but here they
messages.messageBody:
Hi again,

I just finished reading that Vaccine Guide book, and there's a list of
web sites in the back. I haven't checked any of them out yet, but here
they are:

http://www.healthy.net/vaccine (this is the author's site)

http://www.access1.net/via (Vaccine Information & Awareness - includes
links to both pro-vaccine and pro-choice sites)

http://www.909shot.com (National Vaccine Information Center, a
parent-sponsored group which lobbies for safer vaccines and freedom of
choice legislation)

http://www.thinktwice.com (another vaccine info author's site, has info
on his books as well as legal resources and info services)

http://www.i-wayco.com/niin/index.html (Natural Immunity Information
Network)


I can't wait to get started reading my next book: "How To Raise A
Healthy Child... In Spite Of Your Doctor" by Mendelsohn. Followed by the
LLL book "Womanly Art of Breastfeeding". Depending on how this week
goes, though, I might need to read the breastfeeding book first! I'm at
39 weeks today, and baby is movin' on down!

Take care,

Nicole
